New Records: Toronto Blue Jays set a franchise record for the largest shutout win
Season highs for runs (15) and hits (23)
Daulton Varsho and Spencer Horwitz each hit two-run home runs
Key Match Events: Three two-run home runs in the first inning
José Berríos pitched six shutout innings
Post-Match Reflections: José Berríos mentioned having a fever
John Schneider highlighted Daulton Varsho's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Twins remain 3.5 games behind in the American League Central
Will Wagner had five hits, the first rookie in Blue Jays history
